005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014public interface IContainerModelAssembly extends IContainerModelAbsolute {
015
016  /**
017   * Get all choice instances within the container.
018   *
019   * @return a list of choice instances
020   */
021  @NonNull
022  List<? extends IChoiceInstance> getChoiceInstances();
023
024  /**
025   * Get the choice group model instance contained within the model with the
026   * associated group as name.
027   *
028   * @param name
029   *          the group as name of the choice group instance
030   * @return the matching choice group instance, or {@code null} if no match was
031   *         found
032   * @see IChoiceGroupInstance#getGroupAsName()
033   */
034  @Nullable
035  IChoiceGroupInstance getChoiceGroupInstanceByName(String name);
036
037  /**
038   * Get all choice group instances within the container.
039   *
040   * @return a list of choice instances
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  Map<String, ? extends IChoiceGroupInstance> getChoiceGroupInstances();
044}
